# B

# 1

```{r}
sw_films %>% 
  str()

sw_films %>% 
  length()

films <- 1:length(sw_films)
chars <- rep(NA, length(sw_films))

for(i in films){
  chars[i] <- as.list(sw_films[[i]]$characters) %>% 
    length()
}

titles <- rep(NA, length(sw_films))

for(i in films){
  titles[i] <- sw_films[[i]]$title
}

ans <- rep(NA, length(sw_films)) %>% 
  as.list()

for(i in films){
  ans[i] <- paste0(titles[i], ": ", chars[i]) 
}

ans

```

# 2

```{r}
sw_species %>% 
  length()

# sw_species[[2]]$hair_colors
# sw_species[[2]]$name

spec <- 1:length(sw_species)
hair <- data.frame(matrix(ncol=2,nrow=length(sw_species), dimnames=list(NULL, c("name", "color"))))


for(i in spec){
  hair$name[i] <- sw_species[[i]]$name
  hair$color[i] <- sw_species[[i]]$hair_colors
}

hair %>%
  filter(color != "n/a" & color != "none")

```
